data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yao, Gang, Evenhuis, Neal L. (2016): First record of Bombylisoma Rondani (Diptera: Bombyliidae) from China and an identification key to the Chinese genera of Bombyliinae. Zootaxa 4137 (2): 281-285, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.2.9
